'''v0.7.3 alpha''' is a minor update to'' [[Pocket Edition|Minecraft: Pocket Edition]]'' that was released on August 15, 2013.<ref>http://web.archive.org/web/20130821065119/https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.mojang.minecraftpe</ref> This version adds support for the [[daylight cycle]] and [[Splashes]], and fixes some of the bugs and crashes in [[Pocket Edition v0.7.2 alpha|v0.7.2]].

Support for iOS 4.3 was dropped with this version, with iOS 5.0 now being the minimum supported version. Users running iOS 4.3 can still play v0.7.2 and earlier.<ref>{{tweet|jbernhardsson|365109428074201088|We moved to iOS version 5.0 for the 0.7.3 release. We hope this won't cause problems (we have no data on the number of 4.3 devices).|August 7, 2013}}</ref>

== Additions ==
{{Additions table|Quartz Slab}}

=== Gameplay ===
* [[Sun]], [[moon]], stars, [[daylight cycle|sunrise and sunset]] added.
* Improved title screen
* [[Splash]]es
** Added 309 splashes. See [[/Splashes]].
* [[Panorama]]
** The menu panorama uses seed <code>2151901553968352745</code> in [[Java Edition Beta 1.7.3]] at coordinates (61, 75, -68).<ref>{{reddit|url=hthrmk|title=BIG NEWS! We have found the SEED of Minecraft's title-screen background PANORAMA!|author=Tomlacko|date=July 18, 2020}}
** Unlike on [[Java Edition]], the panorama pictures is blurred directly instead of an overlay on [[Java Edition]]
</ref>
** Panorama pictures is directly blurred instead of overlay on [[Java Edition]]
* Pocket realms improvements:
** Realms can be reset

=== Blocks ===
* [[File:Large Chest.gif|width=42x42]] [[File:Chest.gif|width=42x42]]Double [[chest]]s
** When chests are put together, items previously in the left chest appear at the bottom half. Items from the right chest will also appear at the top. This may cause a loss of items.
** Chests now have an open/close animation.
** The player can open chests in creative, but not look inside; they will immediately close.
* Quartz [[slab]]s

== Changes ==

=== General ===
* Added more friction when flying in Creative Mode (iOS).
* Stopped building the game with typeinfo enabled (iOS).
* Wooden slab material changed to wood instead of stone. Wooden Slabs stored from before 0.7.3 are tagged as ''Fake Wood Slab'' and drop regular wooden slabs when mined.
* When creating a new world, the default name shows "My World".

=== Mobs ===
* Mobs now light on fire under sunlight.
